channel.title: Talks on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on A Blog

item.title: Talk Slides Now Available
item.description: In putting up the slides for the talk I gave at last week’s Bay Area R meetup, I figured it would be good to dig up the slides from previous talks and post them here too. (In fact, I linked to one of them in the slides from last week.) So, there’s now a “Talks” section of the site.
